parameters.name: name
parameters.description: object name

parameters.name: refers_to
parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that refers to another Avi resource. Its syntax is refers_to=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all virtual services referring to pool p1 will be refers_to=pool:pool_p1_uuid

parameters.name: referred_by
parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that are referred by another Avi resource. Its syntax is referred_by=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all pools referred_by virtual service vs1 - referred_by=virtualservice:vs_vs1_uuid

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List of fields to be returned for the resource. Some fields like name, URL, uuid etc. are always returned.

parameters.name: include_name
parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.

parameters.name: skip_default
parameters.description: Default values are not set.

parameters.name: join_subresources
parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID

parameters.name: X-Avi-Version
parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.

parameters.name: X-CSRFToken
parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID

parameters.name: X-Avi-Version
parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.

parameters.name: X-CSRFToken
parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the object to fetch

version.description: Protobuf version number. Gets incremented if there is se Diff of federated diff in config pbs.This field will be a monotonically increasing number indicating the number of Config Update operations. Field introduced in 21.1.1. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials edition with any value, Basic edition with any value, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

body.description: Certificate Revocation list from a given issuer in PEM format. This can either be configured directly or via the server_url. . Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

common_name.description: Common name of the issuer in the Certificate Revocation list. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

distinguished_name.description: Distinguished name of the issuer in the Certificate Revocation list. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

etag.description: Cached etag to optimize the download of the CRL. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

fingerprint.description: Fingerprint of the CRL. Used to avoid configuring duplicates. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

last_refreshed.description: Last time CRL was refreshed by the system. This is an internal field used by the system. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

last_update.description: The date when this CRL was last issued. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

next_update.description: The date when a newer CRL will be available. Also conveys the date after which the CRL should be considered obsolete. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

server_url.description: URL of a server that issues the Certificate Revocation list. If this is configured, CRL will be periodically downloaded either based on the configured update interval or the next update interval in the CRL. CRL itself is stored in the body. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

text.description: Certificate Revocation list in plain text for readability. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

update_interval.description: Interval in minutes to check for CRL update. If not specified, interval will be 1 day. Allowed values are 30-525600. Unit is MIN. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

key.description: Key. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

value.description: Value. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

_last_modified.description: UNIX time since epoch in microseconds. Units(MICROSECONDS).

ca_certs.description: List of Certificate Authorities (Root and Intermediate) trusted that is used for certificate validation. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

configpb_attributes.description: Protobuf versioning for config pbs. Field introduced in 21.1.1. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials edition with any value, Basic edition with any value, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

created_by.description: Creator name. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

crl_check.description: When enabled, Avi will verify via CRL checks that certificates in the trust chain have not been revoked. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

crls.description: Certificate Revocation Lists. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

ignore_peer_chain.description: When enabled, Avi will not trust Intermediate and Root certs presented by a client.  Instead, only the chain certs configured in the Certificate Authority section will be used to verify trust of the client's cert. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials edition(Allowed values- true), Basic edition(Allowed values- true), Enterprise with Cloud Services edition. Special default for Essentials edition is true, Basic edition is true, Enterprise is False.

is_federated.description: This field describes the object's replication scope. If the field is set to false, then the object is visible within the controller-cluster and its associated service-engines.  If the field is set to true, then the object is replicated across the federation.  . Field introduced in 17.1.3. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

markers.description: List of labels to be used for granular RBAC. Field introduced in 20.1.5. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials edition with any value, Basic edition with any value, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

name.description: Name of the PKI Profile. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

tenant_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type Tenant. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

uuid.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

validate_only_leaf_crl.description: When enabled, Avi will only validate the revocation status of the leaf certificate using CRL. To enable validation for the entire chain, disable this option and provide all the relevant CRLs. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials edition(Allowed values- true), Basic edition(Allowed values- true), Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

key.description: Key for filter match. Field introduced in 20.1.3. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

values.description: Values for filter match. Multiple values will be evaluated as OR. Example  key = value1 OR key = value2. Behavior for match is key = * if this field is empty. Field introduced in 20.1.3. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

certificate.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

certificate_signing_request.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

chain_verified.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

days_until_expire.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

expiry_status.description: Enum options - SSL_CERTIFICATE_GOOD, SSL_CERTIFICATE_EXPIRY_WARNING, SSL_CERTIFICATE_EXPIRED. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

fingerprint.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

issuer.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

key_params.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

not_after.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

not_before.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

public_key.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

self_signed.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

serial_number.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

signature.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

signature_algorithm.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

subject.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

subject_alt_names.description: subjectAltName that provides additional subject identities. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

text.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

version.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

common_name.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

country.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

distinguished_name.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

email_address.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

locality.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

organization.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

organization_unit.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

state.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

curve.description: Enum options - SSL_KEY_EC_CURVE_SECP256R1, SSL_KEY_EC_CURVE_SECP384R1, SSL_KEY_EC_CURVE_SECP521R1. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

algorithm.description: Enum options - SSL_KEY_ALGORITHM_RSA, SSL_KEY_ALGORITHM_EC. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

ec_params.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

rsa_params.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

exponent.description: Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.

key_size.description: Enum options - SSL_KEY_1024_BITS, SSL_KEY_2048_BITS, SSL_KEY_3072_BITS, SSL_KEY_4096_BITS. Allowed in Enterprise edition with any value, Essentials, Basic, Enterprise with Cloud Services edition.
